http_auth

void http_auth ( $accounts, [$realm = 'Caroshi'] )

Do HTTP authentication. 
This function stops program execution if authentication fails.
Function Parameters:
- array $accounts: Crypted passwords keyed by user name.
- string $realm:
Function Info:
See - htpasswd_read()
